trans-unit.source: Provides evidence about the hash value for an assembly.
trans-unit.target: 提供程序集有关的哈希值的证据。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: A hash value represents a unique value that corresponds to a particular set of bytes.
trans-unit.target: 哈希值表示对应于一组特定的字节的唯一值。

trans-unit.source: Rather than referring to an assembly by name, version, or other designation, a hash value designates the assembly without ambiguity.
trans-unit.target: 而不是按名称、 版本或指定其他引用程序集，哈希值指定清楚无误地程序集。

trans-unit.source: Names are subject to collisions in rare cases where the same name is given to completely different code.
trans-unit.target: 名称受到极少数情况下，其中完全不同的代码指定相同的名称冲突。

trans-unit.source: Different variations of code can accidentally be marked with the same version.
trans-unit.target: 意外可以使用相同的版本标记的代码的不同变体。

trans-unit.source: However, even changing a single bit results in a very different hash value.
trans-unit.target: 但是，即使只更改单一位将导致非常不同的哈希值。

trans-unit.source: Hash values are a cryptographically secure way to refer to specific assemblies in policy without the use of digital signatures.
trans-unit.target: 哈希值是指在无需使用数字签名的策略中的特定程序集的安全加密方法。

trans-unit.source: A secure hash algorithm is designed so that it is computationally infeasible to construct a different assembly with the identical hash value by either an accidental or malicious attempt.
trans-unit.target: 安全哈希算法的设计目的的因此不能通过计算意外或恶意尝试通过以下任一方法构造具有相同的哈希值的不同程序集。

trans-unit.source: By default, evidence from the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SHA1> and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.MD5> hash algorithms is supported, although any hash algorithm can be used through <xref:System.Security.Policy.Hash.GenerateHash%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，从<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SHA1><xref:System.Security.Cryptography.MD5>支持哈希算法，但可以通过<xref:System.Security.Policy.Hash.GenerateHash%2A>.</xref:System.Security.Policy.Hash.GenerateHash%2A>使用任何哈希算法</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.MD5>和</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SHA1>证据

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Policy.Hash"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Security.Policy.Hash"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The hash value computation is not performed until one of the properties or methods is called.
trans-unit.target: 调用其中一个属性或方法之前，将不会执行哈希值计算。

trans-unit.source: The assembly for which to compute the hash value.
trans-unit.target: 为其计算哈希值的程序集。

trans-unit.source: The assembly parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The assembly parameter is .

trans-unit.source: assembly is not a run-time object.
trans-unit.target: assembly不是运行时对象。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new object that is a copy of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 创建当前实例副本的新对象。

trans-unit.source: A new object that is a copy of this instance.
trans-unit.target: 此实例副本的新对象。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.Security.Policy.Hash"></xref> object that contains an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.MD5"></xref> hash value.
trans-unit.target: 创建<xref href="System.Security.Policy.Hash"></xref>对象，其中包含<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.MD5"></xref>哈希值。

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Security.Policy.Hash> object contains only the <xref:System.Security.Policy.Hash.MD5%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref:System.Security.Policy.Hash>对象只包含<xref:System.Security.Policy.Hash.MD5%2A>属性。</xref:System.Security.Policy.Hash.MD5%2A> </xref:System.Security.Policy.Hash>

trans-unit.source: A byte array that contains an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.MD5"></xref> hash value.
trans-unit.target: 字节数组，其中包含<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.MD5"></xref>哈希值。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the hash value provided by the md5 parameter.
trans-unit.target: 包含提供的哈希值的对象 md5 参数。

trans-unit.source: The md5 parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The md5 parameter is .

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.Security.Policy.Hash"></xref> object that contains a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.SHA1"></xref> hash value.
trans-unit.target: 创建<xref href="System.Security.Policy.Hash"></xref>对象，其中包含<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.SHA1"></xref>哈希值。

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Security.Policy.Hash> object contains only the <xref:System.Security.Policy.Hash.SHA1%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref:System.Security.Policy.Hash>对象只包含<xref:System.Security.Policy.Hash.SHA1%2A>属性。</xref:System.Security.Policy.Hash.SHA1%2A> </xref:System.Security.Policy.Hash>

trans-unit.source: A byte array that contains a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.SHA1"></xref> hash value.
trans-unit.target: 字节数组，其中包含<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.SHA1"></xref>哈希值。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the hash value provided by the sha1 parameter.
trans-unit.target: 包含提供的哈希值的对象 sha1 参数。

trans-unit.source: The sha1 parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The sha1 parameter is .

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.Security.Policy.Hash"></xref> object that contains a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.SHA256"></xref> hash value.
trans-unit.target: 创建<xref href="System.Security.Policy.Hash"></xref>对象，其中包含<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.SHA256"></xref>哈希值。

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Security.Policy.Hash> object contains only the <xref:System.Security.Policy.Hash.SHA256%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref:System.Security.Policy.Hash>对象只包含<xref:System.Security.Policy.Hash.SHA256%2A>属性。</xref:System.Security.Policy.Hash.SHA256%2A> </xref:System.Security.Policy.Hash>

trans-unit.source: A byte array that contains a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.SHA256"></xref> hash value.
trans-unit.target: 字节数组，其中包含<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.SHA256"></xref>哈希值。

trans-unit.source: A hash object that contains the hash value provided by the sha256 parameter.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含提供的哈希值的哈希对象 sha256 参数。

trans-unit.source: The sha256 parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The sha256 parameter is .

trans-unit.source: Computes the hash value for the assembly using the specified hash algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 程序集使用指定的哈希算法计算的哈希值。

trans-unit.source: The assembly specified in the class constructor provides the bytes for computing the hash value.
trans-unit.target: 在类构造函数中指定的程序集提供了用于计算哈希值的字节。

trans-unit.source: The `hashAlg` parameter is an object derived from a specific <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithm>.
trans-unit.target: `hashAlg`参数是派生自特定<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithm>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithm>一个对象

trans-unit.source: The returned hash value is of the type identified by `hashAlg`.
trans-unit.target: 返回的哈希值是标识的类型`hashAlg`。

trans-unit.source: The hash algorithm to use to compute the hash value for the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 要使用程序集计算的哈希值的哈希算法。

trans-unit.source: A byte array that represents the hash value for the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 字节数组，表示程序集的哈希值。

trans-unit.source: The hashAlg parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The hashAlg parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The hash value for the assembly cannot be generated.
trans-unit.target: 无法生成程序集的哈希值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object with the parameter name and additional exception information.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref>带有参数名和附加异常信息的对象。

trans-unit.source: This method is provided to support inheritance of the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable> interface.
trans-unit.target: 提供此方法是为了支持继承的<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable>接口。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable>

trans-unit.source: The object that holds the serialized object data.
trans-unit.target: 承载序列化的对象数据的对象。

trans-unit.source: The contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: 有关源或目标的上下文信息。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.MD5"></xref> hash value for the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.MD5"></xref>为程序集哈希值。

trans-unit.source: The assembly specified in the class constructor provides the bytes for the hash computation.
trans-unit.target: 在类构造函数中指定的程序集提供了用于计算哈希值的字节。

trans-unit.source: A byte array that represents the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.MD5"></xref> hash value for the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 一个字节数组，表示<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.MD5"></xref>为程序集哈希值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.SHA1"></xref> hash value for the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.SHA1"></xref>为程序集哈希值。

trans-unit.source: The assembly specified in the constructor provides the bytes for the hash computation.
trans-unit.target: 构造函数中指定的程序集提供了用于计算哈希值的字节。

trans-unit.source: A byte array that represents the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.SHA1"></xref> hash value for the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 一个字节数组，表示<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.SHA1"></xref>为程序集哈希值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.SHA256"></xref> hash value for the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.SHA256"></xref>为程序集哈希值。

trans-unit.source: The assembly that is specified in the <xref:System.Security.Policy.Hash.%23ctor%2A> constructor provides the bytes for the hash computation.
trans-unit.target: 中指定的程序集<xref:System.Security.Policy.Hash.%23ctor%2A>构造函数提供了用于计算哈希值的字节。</xref:System.Security.Policy.Hash.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A byte array that represents the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.SHA256"></xref> hash value for the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 一个字节数组，表示<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.SHA256"></xref>为程序集哈希值。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string representation of the current <xref href="System.Security.Policy.Hash"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前的字符串表示<xref href="System.Security.Policy.Hash"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful during debugging to get an easy-to-read representation of the object.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取的对象的易于理解表示在调试期间，此方法很有用。

trans-unit.source: A representation of the current <xref href="System.Security.Policy.Hash"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 表示形式当前<xref href="System.Security.Policy.Hash"> </xref>。
